    #include<stdio.h>
    long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
    { if(b==0)
    return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
    }
    int main()
    { long long t,x1,y1,x2,y2,n1,n2,flag;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    { scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
    if(x1<0)
    x1=-x1;
    if(y1<0)
    y1=-y1;
    if(x2<0)
    x2=-x2;
    if(y2<0)
    y2=-y2;
    n1=gcd(x1,y1);
    n2=gcd(x2,y2);
    flag=0;
    while (n1 > 0 && n1 < n2)
    n1 *= 2;
    if(n1==n2)
    printf("YES\n");
    else
    printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
    }
